definition: old name for Nanjing 南京, esp. during Southern dynasties
to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct
healthy/peaceful/abundant
surname Kang

sentences.english: The research and arrangement of Veritable Records of Jiankang has obtained significant achievements.
sentences.chinese: 《建康實錄》的整理與研究業已取得令人矚目的成績。

sentences.english: I hope you baby also Jiankang growth.
sentences.chinese: 希望你的寶寶也建康成長。

sentences.english: The rearrangement and research in Veritable Records of Jiankang has attained a remarkable achievement.
sentences.chinese: 《建康實錄》的整理與研究業已取得令人矚目的成績。

sentences.english: The man who is honest, healthy, show consideration, care for and trust each other, interdependently accompany each other in the future.
sentences.chinese: 誠實的建康的男士，互相體貼關懷和信任，相伴永恆。

sentences.english: During these times it was known by the names Jianye and Jiankang .
sentences.chinese: 在這些時候，是已知的名字建業和建康。

sentences.english: Let's make vegetarian food a lifestyle towards healthy living for the benefits of all mankind.
sentences.chinese: 讓素食料理成爲我們日常生活的一個重要建康食品。

sentences.english: Friendship is both a source of pleasure and a componet of good health.
sentences.chinese: 友誼既是快樂的源泉，又是建康之要素。
